name: Kim Nen
description:
Installation Instructions

PC:

1. Right click -> Extract All...

2. Inside extracted folder, run Kimnen Application file

3. If "Windows protected your PC" shows up, More info -> Run Anyways

Note: If that file doesn't work, navigate to "Kimnen-1.0-pc\Kimnen-1.0-pc\lib\windows-i686" and run the executable there

Mac: 

1. Double click zip file

2. On Kimnen Application, control-click -> Open 

3. Open

Controls are in the "Help" menu of the game.

It'll take around 1 hour and 15 minutes to finish depending on how fast you read through it.
